column4: can i get some hard drive mounting help please. This is the error i get when i try to use Disk Utility to mount the drive. http://img708.imageshack.us/img708/1226/screenshotaqu.png
It says that "according to mtab none is already mounted to none"
its a partition, not a drive. You are mounting /dev/sda1   sda is the drive, sda1 is the partition
do you know how i can change the settings to force it to mount on sda1?
